itunes:title: I'm Going To Court
title: I'm Going To Court
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Farting in a new BMW, going to small claims court, flying over the North Pole, the morning routine, and the debate of who gets the armrest on the airplanes.


Thanks to our sponsors Vodacast, Ember, and Hello Fresh.


Check Out Vodacast Here: http://feed.vodacast.com/60761963/Lightweights%20Podcast/I'm%20Going%20To%20Court


Video Clips Podcast Channel Here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCChM6tHqj-4FwbG_KdIjKUw 


FULL Video Podcast Here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmqbxZsoH1YwihrGgU1vPA


follow us on Instagram @lightweightspod // @ilyafeddy // @ughitsjoe
